snippet: The Chinese government and central bank should be "very cautious" in implementing any stimulus programs because they tend to be less efficient than natural market forces in boosting growth, a People's Bank of China official said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: China Should Be Very Cautious With Any Stimulus-Central Bank
headline.main: China Should Be Very Cautious With Any Stimulus-Central Bank

lead_paragraph: The Chinese government and central bank should be "very cautious" in implementing any stimulus programs because they tend to be less efficient than natural market forces in boosting growth, a People's Bank of China official said on Thursday.
